title: Development of a Social-Constructivist-Based Elementary English Education Material Design Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and general understanding of primary education environments
context.additional_context: Strengthening the capacity to design practical English teaching materials applicable to real classrooms for current elementary school teachers.

learning_goals: Apply an English instructional material design framework reflecting learners' social contexts and functional needs
Develop interactive English activity materials based on constructivist principles
Establish differentiated strategies reflecting learner needs analysis results across ESL/EFL environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
